title: Why Good Arguments Are Essential to Good Democracies
itunes:title: Why Good Arguments Are Essential to Good Democracies
description:
Journalist and author Bo Seo discusses his book Good Arguments: How Debate Teaches Us to Listen and Be Heard.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
